long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Impero Education Pro Chrome Browser Extension enables you to manage and monitor devices running the Google Chrome Browser on your network helping to ensure that students are on task, learning and safe.

For support in relation to the Impero Education Pro Chrome Browser Extension, including installation and configuration, please visit https://www.imperosoftware.com/uk/support/ for further information
